name: places/ChIJdQQQXgdZwokRAfzokgSIZyI

displayName.text: Manhattan Dental Spa: Charnas Mitchell DMD

formattedAddress: 200 Madison Ave Suite 2201, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 200 Madison Ave Suite 2201, New York, NY 10016, USA

originalText.text: I finally returned to Manhattan Dental Spa after some time away and it was like I never left!  My experiences have always been great, but on my return visit I felt even more comfortable and know that this will be my steady regular dentist. The staff is always friendly and make you feel at home. On my return I was hoping that Dr. John Vargas was still apart of the staff and was happy to see that he was. He made me feel so comfortable and confident on an upcoming procedure he will be performing on me. I will be returning on a regular basis!

originalText.text: I normally don’t leave reviews but Dr. Charnas’s office and staff are great! I went in for the first time and had a great cleaning with lots of helpful info. I also had a consultation with Karl about my Invisalign’s I already had and got set with retainers. Overall, it was awesome and I already have my next appointment set up!

text.text: I normally don’t leave reviews but Dr. Charnas’s office and staff are great! I went in for the first time and had a great cleaning with lots of helpful info. I also had a consultation with Karl about my Invisalign’s I already had and got set with retainers. Overall, it was awesome and I already have my next appointment set up!

originalText.text: I really love the hygienists there they are very sweet and super professional. Special shout out to Rosanna, she is the sweetest person, I highly recommend her. I’ve been going there for 2 years and was always seeing different doctors every time - which is not amazing. And the reception is also not functioning very well. I did my annual cleaning yesterday and doctor found a little cavity on my tooth so I needed to do filling and was told  how much it would be for me to do filling based on my insurance and deductible. But today after my filling was done the price suddenly increased by 50$ with the same insurance as I had yesterday. I don’t think it’s very professional to lie to your customers about the price at that point. I don’t think I will be going back.

originalText.text: I really love going to Manhattan Dental Spa, Everyone there is so professional and caring to all your needs. I'm always a nervous wreck when going to the Dentist..but they make me feel I am in very good hands. My Dentist Dr. John Vargas is the Best!

originalText.text: I have been going to Manhattan Dental Spa for over 15 years.  The care and professional staff is some of the best in the business.  Dr Charnas has been my dentist all these years and is the best in the dental care industry !!!
